title: Additional Options
tooltip: Customize Super Mario 64 with additional options

title: Rumble Support
tooltip: Adds Rumble Support to Super Mario 64

title: Lowpoly Promo Mario Model
tooltip: Replaces Mario's model with the promo model for Mario

title: Lowpoly Promo Luigi Model
tooltip: Replaces Mario's model with the promo model for Luigi

title: render96 Mario Model
tooltip: render96 patch with the Mario model with 3D models and promo styles for several objects{0}Both widescreen (stretched HUD) and puppycam can be enabled/disabled in the pause menu

title: render96 Luigi Model
tooltip: render96 patch with the Luigi model with 3D models and promo styles for several objects{0}Both widescreen (stretched HUD) and puppycam can be enabled/disabled in the pause menu

title: Multiplayer
tooltip: Single-Screen Multiplayer with Mario and Luigi{0}Plugin a second emulated controller for Luigi

title: Split-Screen Multiplayer
tooltip: Split-Screen Multiplayer with Mario and Luigi{0}Plugin a second emulated controller for Luigi

title: Arguably Better Edition
tooltip: Changes Super Mario 64 to make it a better game overall{0}It features some additional bonus features{0}4:3 standard aspect ratio version

title: Arguably Better Edition (WS)
tooltip: Changes Super Mario 64 to make it a better game overall{0}It features some additional bonus features{0}16:9 widescreen aspect ratio version

title: Star Road
tooltip: A brand new world for Super Mario 64 with new stages and more than 120 stars to collect

title: Star Road
tooltip: A brand new world for Super Mario 64 with new stages and more than 120 stars to collect

title: Super Mario Odyssey 64
tooltip: A brand new world for Super Mario 64 with new stages and 80 stars to collect

title: Italian Translation
tooltip: Italian Translation of Super Mario 64{0}Based on the Japanese Shindou version

title: iQue: Header Fix + Save Fix + Rumble Fix
tooltip: Fix the header, saving and rumble for the Chinese iQue ROM
